definition: abnormally deficient in color as suggesting physical or emotional distress, a wooden strip forming part of a fence, turn pale, as if in fear
details:
adjective
- abnormally deficient in color as suggesting physical or emotional distress
= synonyms: wan
- lacking in vitality or interest or effectiveness
= example: lacking in vitality or interest or effectiveness
= synonyms: pallid
- very light colored
- not full or rich
= example: not full or rich
- (of light) lacking in intensity or brightness
= synonyms: wan
noun
- a wooden strip forming part of a fence
= synonyms: picket
verb
- turn pale, as if in fear
= synonyms: blanch, blench
